quadrants.name: Tight
quadrants.label: Tight Player (Nit)
quadrants.description: Plays fewer, high-value hands. Strength: minimizes losses by playing only the best hands; Weakness: can be overly predictable.

quadrants.name: Loose
quadrants.label: Loose Player (LAG)
quadrants.description: Plays many hands and can be unpredictable. Strength: creates big pots; Weakness: often involved in marginal situations.

quadrants.name: Aggressive
quadrants.label: Aggressive
quadrants.description: Frequently bets and raises, putting constant pressure on opponents. Strength: forces errors from opponents; Weakness: can overcommit chips.

quadrants.name: Passive
quadrants.label: Passive Player (Calling Station)
quadrants.description: Calls more than bets, rarely taking control of the hand. Strength: can trap aggressive players; Weakness: rarely seizes initiative.
